data.name: Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020
data.detailed_description:
GET ALL YOU NEED IN ONE APP WITH DLCs AVAILABLE!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1783540/Movavi_Video_Suite_2022_Steam_Edition__Video_Making_Software_Video_Editor_Plus_Screen_Recorder_and_Video_Converter_Premium/


About the Software

Don’t wait for hours to get your videos converted. Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020 will transform your videos in no time – and with no loss of quality. Reduce the file size for your favorite movies and TV series so they take less space on your hard drive, and convert them to any of 180+ supported formats.


Popular Formats and Ready-made Presets

Use any popular multimedia format in the converter: MP4, AVI, MOV, FLV, MKV, WMV;MP3, WAV, WMA, FLAC, AAC; JPG, PNG, GIF, RAW formats, and more. Save your multimedia files with the optimal settings for uploading to YouTube and other platforms, or make them perfect for viewing on any device. Use ready-made presets for smartphones, tablets, and laptops, so you can upload your video on the target device right after conversion.


Online Subtitle Search

With Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020, you can search for subtitles online right from the program. Choose the language you need, the season and episode number, and even the IMDb ID. Video Converter adds downloaded subtitles to the video automatically. You can also change the subtitle font, color, and size.


Ultrafast Conversion

With support for many types of hardware acceleration, file conversion will take no time at all. The program’s compatibility with Intel®, AMD®, and NVIDIA® technologies will help convert files 3-5 times faster! Try the SuperSpeed mode for HD movies: the program converts any size videos in no time and preserves quality.


Easy Editing

Enhance your files with the built-in editor:
  • Trim videos without converting them, instantly and without loss of quality
  • Create animated intros or overlay image watermarks
  • Change volume levels, remove background noise
  • Change the font, color, and size of subtitles
  • Select audio streams, bitrates, and subtitle tracks for all files at once
  • Adjust colors, add video-enhancing filters



File conversion with Movavi Video Converter Premium 2020 takes next to no time and delivers the highest possible quality.

data.short_description: Change file formats, reduce your media file size, and convert movies to watch on your smartphone or tablet. Add colorful filters and convert TV series in SuperSpeed mode in no time.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/10 with up-to-date patches and service packs installed
  • Processor: Intel®, AMD®, or compatible processor, 1 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® series 8, Intel® HD Graphics 2000, AMD Radeon™ R600 or higher graphics card with up-to-date drivers
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
